backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented UI features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and utility layers plus OKLCH-based CSS variables defining light and dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point providing root div and loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component wrapping the app in a ThemeProvider and rendering header, registration flow, and footer.
Simple layout wrapper providing a centered max-width container.
frontend/src/components/registration/Ste: Visual step header showing progress indicators and titles for the registration flow.
frontend/src/components/ThemeSwitcher.ts: Theme switcher UI offering light/dark toggle and theme selection via dropdown.
frontend/src/features/registration/Regis: Controls navigation through registration steps and manages shared registration data state.
frontend/src/features/registration/types: Type definitions for registration form data and validation errors.
frontend/src/features/registration/valid: Client-side validation logic for registration fields plus a helper to check overall validity.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance based on authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Defines a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and loading stored identities. Wraps AuthClient with custom options and exposes state and helpers via a hook.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base, components, and utilities with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and typography utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/Confirmation.tsx: Displays a confirmation screen after successful exam registration with next steps and a reset button.
frontend/src/pages/ExamSelection.tsx: Provides a UI to choose an exam from mock options, highlighting the selection and allowing navigation forward or back.
frontend/src/pages/LandingStart.tsx: Landing page describing the registration steps and offering a button to start the process.
frontend/src/pages/RegistrationDetails.t: Form page for entering student and exam session details with validation, tracking touched fields, and submitting when valid.
frontend/src/pages/Review.tsx: React page showing a summary of registration data and exam details with confirm/back actions.
frontend/src/theme/ThemeProvider.tsx: Provides a context-driven theme system allowing theme and mode selection with persistence.
frontend/src/theme/themes.ts: Defines multiple color-theme configurations with light/dark palettes for the UI.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and enabling theme-driven CSS variables.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing scope, features, design requirements, and current progress for the UI draft.
